0.text:
Innate: Vayne gains  30 bonus movement speed while facing a nearby  visible enemy champion.
 Final Hour Bonus: The bonus movement speed is tripled to 90.
Active: Vayne  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain. Her next basic attack within 7 seconds will deal bonus physical damage.

1.text: Tumble  resets Vayne's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Vayne's basic attacks  on-hit and  Condemn apply a stack of Silver Bolts for 3.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits, expires upon attacking a new enemy, and stacks up to 3 times.

1.text: The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus true damage, with a minimum threshold. This damage is capped at 200 against  monsters.

0.text: Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy that deals physical damage and  knocks them back 475 units, though not through terrain.

1.text: If the target hits terrain, they take  bonus physical damage and become  stunned for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling  Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.

1.text: Additionally,  Tumble becomes empowered with a  reduced cooldown, and grants Vayne  invisibility for 1 second. Attacking or casting  Condemn breaks the stealth immediately.

2.text: Scoring an enemy champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them will extend Final Hour's duration by 4 seconds, up to its original duration.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage, and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  600

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wrath: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Unique – Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a 0.15 second delay.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WRATH: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  900

Stats

+40 attack damage
+40% attack speed
+40 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fray: Basic attacks deal 15 − 80 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and grant you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FRAY: Basic attacks deal 15 − 80 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and grant you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  775

Passive

1.originHTML: +  +  +  300

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+40 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Humility: Unleash a shockwave around you that slows nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduces their attack damage by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – HUMILITY: Unleash a shockwave around you that  slows nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduces their attack damage by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne) from your champion and grants 50% bonus total movement speed and ghosting for 1 second (90 second cooldown).

Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling  Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.

1.concerningText: Additionally,  Tumble becomes empowered with a  reduced cooldown, and grants Vayne  invisibility for 1 second. Attacking or casting  Condemn breaks the stealth immediately.

0.concerningText: Active: Vayne  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain. Her next basic attack within 7 seconds will deal bonus physical damage.
The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus true damage, with a minimum threshold. This damage is capped at 200 against  monsters.
Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy that deals physical damage and  knocks them back 475 units, though not through terrain.
